query:
SELECT 
  system_id,
  part_code_name,
  Count(serial_num) Total,
  Sum(CASE WHEN pass_fail = 'P' THEN 1 ELSE 0 end)Pass_qty,
  Round((Sum(CASE WHEN pass_fail = 'P' THEN 1 ELSE 0 end)/Count(serial_num))*100,0) ||'%' yield,
  Sum(CASE WHEN rework_ind = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 end) rework_qty,
  Round(Sum(CASE WHEN rework_ind = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 end)/Count(serial_num)*100,0)||'%' rework_perc 
FROM (
  SELECT * FROM flex_attach WHERE 
    last_upd_date BETWEEN 
      To_Date(To_Char(SYSDATE-1,'yyyymmdd')||'0630','yyyymmddhh24mi') AND 
      To_Date(To_Char(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd')||'0630','yyyymmddhh24mi')
) GROUP BY system_id, part_code_name
ORDER BY system_id
